name: Banking on Business
title: High Business Financing Through Banks
description: In 2023, 56.5% of firms in the Central African Republic used banks to finance their investments, indicating a strong reliance on formal financial institutions for business growth.

name: Crowded Classrooms
title: High Pupil-Teacher Ratio in Primary Schools
description: With a pupil-teacher ratio of 83.41 in 2016, primary schools in the Central African Republic face significant challenges in providing individual attention to students.

name: Maternal Health Crisis
title: High Lifetime Risk of Maternal Death
description: In 2023, women in the Central African Republic faced a 4.24% lifetime risk of maternal death, highlighting severe challenges in maternal healthcare.

name: Pollution Perils
title: High Mortality Rate from Air Pollution
description: In 2019, the mortality rate attributed to air pollution was 305.1 per 100,000 population, with males experiencing a higher rate of 364.9.

name: Entrepreneurial Spirit
title: High Self-Employment Rates
description: In 2023, 94.54% of the workforce in the Central African Republic was self-employed, with females at 97.59% and males at 91.68%.

name: Vulnerable Workforce
title: High Vulnerable Employment Rates
description: In 2023, 93.32% of the workforce was in vulnerable employment, with females at 96.80% and males at 90.06%.

name: Youthful Nation
title: High Youth Population
description: In 2023, 49.17% of the population was aged 0-14, with males at 51.75%.

name: Early Marriages
title: High Rates of Child Marriage
description: In 2019, 25.8% of women aged 20-24 were married by age 15, and 61% by age 18, indicating prevalent early marriages.

name: High Birth Rates
title: Elevated Birth and Adolescent Fertility Rates
description: In 2023, the crude birth rate was 46.36 per 1,000 people, with an adolescent fertility rate of 163.09 births per 1,000 women aged 15-19.

name: Dependent Dynamics
title: High Age Dependency Ratio
description: In 2023, the age dependency ratio was 105.18%, with a young dependency ratio of 100.88%, indicating a significant proportion of dependents to the working-age population.

name: Trade Tariffs
title: High Tariff Lines with International Peaks
description: In 2022, 81.78% of tariff lines for primary products had international peaks, indicating high trade barriers.

name: Gender Violence
title: High Female Homicide Rate
description: In 2016, the intentional homicide rate for females was 10.62 per 100,000, highlighting significant gender-based violence.

name: Education is a Challenge
title: Low Educational Attainment
description: In 2017, only 10.97% of the relevant age group completed lower secondary education, with female completion at 8.35% and male completion at 13.55%.

name: Health Hurdles
title: Limited Access to Healthcare
description: As of 2021, the country has 0.191 nurses and midwives and 0.021 physicians per 1,000 people, indicating a significant shortage in healthcare professionals.

name: Water Woes
title: Inadequate Water Services
description: In 2022, only 6.13% of the population had access to safely managed drinking water services, while 48.06% of the urban population used basic drinking water services.

name: Internet Isolation
title: Low Internet Penetration
description: In 2019, only 7.51% of the population used the internet, highlighting limited digital connectivity.

name: Financial Friction
title: Inefficient Financial Services
description: In 2024, the operational efficiency of receiving financial services scored 15.77, indicating challenges in financial service accessibility.

name: Trade Troubles
title: Low International Trade Efficiency
description: The overall score for international trade in 2024 was 34.44, reflecting inefficiencies in trade operations.

name: Regulatory Riddles
title: Complex Labor Regulations
description: In 2024, the quality of labor regulations scored 45.90, suggesting room for improvement in labor market policies.

name: Public Service Puzzles
title: Inefficient Public Services
description: The public services pillar scored 18.35 in 2024, indicating inefficiencies in public service delivery.

name: Taxation Tangles
title: Complex Tax System
description: In 2024, the overall score for taxation was 23.28, highlighting challenges in tax system efficiency.

name: Governance Gaps
title: Low Utility Service Governance
description: The quality of governance and transparency of utility services scored 20.11 in 2024, indicating governance challenges.

name: Maternal Mortality Risk
title: High Maternal Death Risk
description: In 2023, the lifetime risk of maternal death was 1 in 24, indicating significant health risks for mothers.

name: Employment Inequality
title: Low Female Employment in Salaried Jobs
description: In 2023, only 2.41% of female employment was in wage and salaried jobs, compared to 8.32% for males.

name: Youth Literacy Lag
title: Low Female Youth Literacy
description: In 2020, the literacy rate for females aged 15-24 was 29.11%, indicating challenges in female education.

name: Human Capital Hurdles
title: Low Human Capital Index
description: In 2020, the Human Capital Index was 0.29, with a lower bound of 0.26, reflecting challenges in human capital development.

name: Political Instability
title: Low Political Stability
description: In 2023, the percentile rank for political stability was 0.47, indicating challenges in maintaining a stable political environment.
